name: Akhenaten, The Sun Pharaoh (Mummy)
effect: Unique mummy with 3 life. 3 strength, 1 bleed. Akhenaten may play cards requiring basic Necromancy as a vampire with a capacity of 3. Any cost in blood is paid with his life. If a card would give him blood, give him life. If he is burned, shuffle him into your library. If he is in combat with a Follower of Set, any damage he inflicts is aggravated. Akhenaten can burn himself to burn a Follower of Set controlled by your prey as a (D) action.

When there are no Pathos counters remaining, remove the retainer from the game.

effect: Independent: (Blood Cursed)

name: Taste of Death
effect: [qui] Strike: 1R damage, aggravated. Only usable at long range. [QUI] Strike: 2R damage, aggravated. Only usable at long range.

name: Temple Hunting Ground
effect: Master: unique location. During your untap phase, a ready vampire you control gains 1 blood from the blood bank. A vampire can gain only 1 blood from Hunting Ground cards each turn.

name: Temptation
effect: [ser] (D) Put this card on a ready vampire; you still control this card. During your master phase, you may put a temptation counter on this card. During your minion phase, if the number of counters on this card equals or exceeds the amount of blood on that vampire, you may burn all the counters on this card to untap that vampire and take control of him or her until the end of your turn. [SER] As above, but put a counter on this card when you put it on the vampire.

name: Terrorists
effect: Mortal with 1 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed. Terrorists may take a +1 stealth action to go through your library, find a Bomb, and equip them with it. Pay the cost to equip as normal. Reshuffle your library afterwards.

name: The Ancestor's Talisman
effect: Unique equipment. The minion with this equipment gets +1 intercept when attempting to block actions that require Dominate or Presence.

name: The Ankara Citadel, Turkey
effect: This equipment card represents a unique location and does not count as equipment while in play. The vampire with this location pays only half of the blood cost for any cards he or she plays (round down).

name: The Damned
effect: Unique Master. Put this card on a vampire with a capacity below 5. The vampire with this card burns 1 additional blood for each bleeding action he or she successfully performs.

name: The Deadliest Sin
effect: Requires a ready vampire. Only usable when a vampire attempts to commit diablerie. This reacting vampire gets +2 intercept. If combat occurs, this reacting vampire gets +2 strength until the end of combat.

name: The Death of My Conscience
effect: Requires a vampire with a capacity above 5. Do not replace this card until after combat. Play before strikes are chosen. [pot] Burn up to 4 cards in your hand. For each card you burn this way, this vampire gets +1 strength for the remainder of combat. Do not replace these cards until after combat. [POT] As above, but this vampire gets +2 strength for the remainder of combat for each card you burn this way.

name: The Khabar: Community
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. Each Assamite gets +1 stealth when bleeding. This card may be burned by any minion as a (D) action; Tremere get +1 stealth when attempting that action.

name: The Khabar: Honor
effect: Only usable if this Assamite has been chosen for a contract on the opposing minion. Strike: strength+3 damage.

name: The Kiss of Ra
effect: Only usable when a vampire who does not have Fortitude attempts to block this acting minion. [for] The block attempt is canceled, the blocking vampire burns 2 blood, and the action is now blocked. [FOR] As above, and the blocking vampire goes into torpor.

name: The Parthenon
effect: Master: unique location. Tap during your master phase to get an additional master phase action.

name: The Path of Blood
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. Assamites burn 1 less blood when playing cards that require Quietus. Any minion may burn this card as a (D) action; if that minion is a vampire, he or she then takes one damage (damage not preventable) when this card is burned.

name: The Path of Typhon
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. Followers of Set burn 1 less blood when playing cards that require Serpentis. Any minion may burn this card as a (D) action; if that minion is a vampire, he or she takes one damage (damage not preventable) when this card is burned.

name: The Peace of Khetamon
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any vampire at +1 stealth. Choose a vampire in torpor. Successful referendum means that vampire is placed face down in his or her controller's uncontrolled region. The vampire's blood counters, master cards, and minion cards stay with that vampire.

name: The Portrait
effect: (D) Show the top card of your prey's crypt to all players. If it is a Nosferatu, the acting vampire burns 2 blood. If the capacity of the revealed vampire is below 7, the acting vampire gains 2 blood (ignore excess blood); if it is from 7 to 10, the acting vampire untaps and bleeds your prey with +1 bleed at +1 stealth; if it is above 10, the acting vampire burns 1 blood.

name: The Realm of the Black Sun
effect: Unique Master. Put this card in play. If your prey gains at least 1 pool during his or her master phase, you gain 1 pool. Any minion may burn this card as a (D) action; vampires with titles get -1 stealth when attempting that action.

name: The Return to Innocence
effect: (D) Bleed. If you successfully bleed your prey for one or more, put this card on the acting vampire. Burn this card if this vampire loses any blood or goes to torpor, or if your prey is ousted. During your next untap, this vampire is removed from the game and your prey burns X pool, where X is the capacity of this vampire.

name: The Secret Library of Alexandria
effect: Master: unique location. You may draw a card each time you successfully bleed your prey. Discard to your maximum hand size afterward.

name: The Signet of King Saul
effect: Unique equipment. The minion with this equipment cannot be blocked by any vampire with a capacity above 7.

name: Thetmes, Caliph of Alamut
effect: Independent: Thetmes has 2 votes. Damage from Thetmes's hand strikes is aggravated. (Blood Cursed)

name: Tomb of Rameses III
effect: Master: unique location. When this card is played or the controller of this card changes, the controller chooses a vampire in his or her uncontrolled region. For each blood counter you transfer to the chosen vampire during your influence phase, move one counter from the blood bank to the Tomb. At the end of your influence phase, if the total number of counters on the chosen vampire and on the Tomb equals or exceeds that vampire's capacity, you may move the vampire to the ready region. Burn this card (and the counters on it) when this vampire leaves the uncontrolled region.

name: Tongue of the Serpent
effect: [ser] Strike: steal 1 blood. [SER] Strike: steal 2 blood.

name: Treachery
effect: Only usable during a referendum before voting occurs. [pre] If the referendum passes, the controller of the vampire calling the referendum burns 1 pool. [PRE] As above, but any other Methuselahs who vote in favor of the referendum burn 1 pool.

name: Treaty of Tyre Enforced
effect: Political Card-Worth 1 Vote. Called by any vampire at +1 stealth. If this referendum is successful, each Methuselah burns X+1 pool, where X is the number of Assamites he or she controls.

name: Uncontrollable Rage
effect: Only usable when the acting vampire's action is announced. [pro] This acting vampire's hand strikes are at +1 damage, and his or her hand damage is aggravated until the end of this action. [PRO] As above, but at +2 damage.

name: Underworld Hunting Ground
effect: Master: unique location. During your untap phase, a ready vampire you control gains 1 blood from the blood bank. A vampire can gain only 1 blood from Hunting Ground cards each turn.

name: Vasilis, The Traitor of Don Cruez
effect: Camarilla: If Vasilis is ready, each ready Giovanni gets +1 bleed when bleeding any Methuselah who controls a Brujah.

name: Violation of Trust
effect: +1 stealth action. Burn a contract on a minion you control.

name: Watenda
effect: Camarilla: Once each combat, Watenda can cancel the effect of a combat card played by an opposing minion by burning an amount of blood equal to the cost of the card. If the card is a strike card, the opposing minion may choose a new strike.

name: Weakness
effect: [qui] Strike: burn one Master Discipline card on the opposing vampire (Remove excess blood). [QUI] As above, and the opposing vampire also takes one damage.

name: Whispers from the Dead
effect: [nec] Move a library card from your ash heap to your hand. Discard down to your maximum hand size afterward. [NEC] As above, but with +1 stealth.

name: Writ of Acceptance
effect: Equipment. The vampire with this equipment is considered a Camarilla vampire.
